overview: 1. The Shadows Of Daybreak I 2. Distraction 3. Swallow The Dark 4. Dakedo Sonna Hibi-No Nakade Boku-Wa 5. Momentary Degeneration 6. Hurt 7. Paranoia 8. Wall A collection of music videos for each of the tracks on Hatred: Destruction=Construction
title: Balzac: Hatred Lies Deep Inside
